pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Monday, August 29, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Survivors’ Flag raising ceremony on Parliament Hill. Minister of Crown-Indigenous Relations Marc Miller and Minister of Northern Affairs, Minister responsible for Prairies Economic Development Canada and Minister responsible for the Canadian Northern Economic Development Agency Dan Vandal will also be in attendance.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with members of the Prime Minister’s Youth Council.

Closed to media
